byline.original: By DIANNE FEINSTEIN and ELLEN O. TAUSCHER

abstract: Op-Ed article by Sen Dianne Feinstein and former Rep Ellen O Tauscher, both of California, urges Pres Obama to reconsider Defense Dept project to develop Long-Range Standoff Weapon, new nuclear cruise missile; argues weapon is not necessary part of safe and reliable nuclear stockpile, and canceling project would be step toward nuclear-free world.
snippet: The Air Force’s development of a cruise missile called the Long-Range Standoff Weapon is costly and dangerous....

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The Air Force’s development of a cruise missile called the Long-Range Standoff Weapon is costly and dangerous.

headline.main: A Nuclear Weapon That America Doesn’t Need
headline.print_headline: A Nuclear Arm the U.S. Doesn’t Need
